entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.8°C

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except south 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections near noon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
